thread.title: Game over for Toys R Us UK arm as shoppers head online

title: Game over for Toys R Us UK arm as shoppers head online
text:
Game over for Toys R Us UK arm as shoppers head online Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:14 
Toys R Us has gone into administration in the UK leaving 3,000 jobs at risk. As Silvia Antonioli reports, the US toy chain failed to find a buyer after struggling for months to compete with online retailers.   
Toys R Us has gone into administration in the UK leaving 3,000 jobs at risk. As Silvia Antonioli reports, the US toy chain failed to find a buyer after struggling for months to compete with online retailers.  //reut.rs/2oxcGlf
